coreAtributes.name: Varia Helmet
coreAtributes.description: She who forgoes a hat and grabs a helmet knows not the sting of lava.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Varia Helmet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Varia Helmet and tear it off [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Varia Helmet and roughly tears it off your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Varia Helmet and roughly tears it off from [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Varia Helmet, the HUD lights up and starts scanning your surroundings.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Varia Helmet on [npc.name]'s [npc.head].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the Varia Helmet onto [npc.her] head.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts the Varia Helmet on your head.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Varia Helmet on top of your head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts the Varia Helmet on [npc2.name]'s head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Varia Helmet onto [npc2.her] head.
